summary.span: 一个流内容元素，表示有序或无序的 中的一个特定内容项。

span.span: A flow content element that represents a particular content item in an ordered or unordered .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强制实施强的内容模型为子内容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)有关详细信息内容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 元素必须包含元素。 elements must be contained by a element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to define a using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ListSnippets#_ListXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_listxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何创建和填充以编程方式。The following example shows how to create and populate a programmatically. [!code-csharp[ListSnippets#_List_Props](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_list_props)] [!code-vb[ListSnippets#_List_Props](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_list_props)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照： 经过排序的列表](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "屏幕快照： 有序列的表")![Screenshot: Ordered list](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "Screenshot: Ordered list") 下面的示例演示如何定义嵌套（在列表中列出了） 使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to define a nested (lists within lists) using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ListSnippets#_NestedListXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_nestedlistxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![嵌套列表](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "嵌套列表")![Nested list](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "Nested list")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 元素中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 值之一，指定相对流动方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 设置此属性将导致 元素的内容重新沿指示的方向流动。Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction. 内容的流方向通常对应于所表示的语言的固有流动方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语是从右到左流动的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英语、 德语和俄语是自然流动从左到右的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值不会自动更改以匹配由操作系统使用的语言。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果您需要使用默认值为不同的值，您必须自行指定。If you need to use a different value than the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的属性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 每个行的高度范围为 0.0034 到 160000，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The height of each line in device independent pixels with a value range of 0.0034 to 160000.

value.span: 值为(等效于特性值"自动") 使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改值不会更改关联的文本的高度; 相反，它更改包含文本行的高度。Changing the value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了此属性中的行的布局受其属性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边距粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个结构，它以设备独立像素为单位指定要应用的边距量。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是超出了元素的内容区域，该元素的内容区域的边缘和父元素的边缘之间的缓冲区空间。 is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 与之相反，这是范围内元素的内容区域，该元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间的缓冲区空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取包含 元素的 ，这些元素是当前 元素的同级元素。

span.span: Gets a that contains the elements that are siblings of the current element.

value.span: 一个包含子级 元素的 ，这些元素直接由当前 元素的父级承载；如果当前 元素无父级，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the child elements that are directly hosted by the parent of the current element, or if the current element has no parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回包含通过其访问集合; 即，被视为拥有此属性的元素用于生成的同级的集合的目的是其自身的同级元素。The returned by this property includes the element through which the collection is accessed; that is, the element that owns this property is considered to be its own sibling for the purposes of generating the collection of siblings.
